statements: UPDATE UserLocationBehavior SET behavior_event = 'clicked' WHERE user_id = 123 AND location_name = 'Home' AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
UPDATE UserLocationBehavior SET location_name = 'Work', timestamp = '2022-01-02 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456 AND behavior_event = 'visited';
UPDATE UserLocationBehavior SET location_name = 'Home', behavior_event = 'Arrived' WHERE user_id = 1234 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE UserLocationBehavior SET location_name = 'Office', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), behavior_event = 'Departed' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE location_behavior SET behavior_type = 'active' WHERE user_id = 123 AND location_id = 456;
UPDATE user_profile SET username = 'john_doe', age = 30, gender = 'M' WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE user_profile SET age = 30, gender = 'M' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE location_behavior SET behavior_type = 'Active' WHERE user_id = 456 AND location_id = 789
UPDATE UserBehavior SET location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE LocationHistory SET timestamp = '2022-01-31 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE UserBehavior SET location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = '0fc0b282-77d8-4b42-b5f0-51bd1aeb2cf9';
UPDATE LocationHistory SET user_id = '0fc0b282-77d8-4b42-b5f0-51bd1aeb2cf9', timestamp = NOW() WHERE location_id = 'de5f5d88-a41a-4214-a10c-75c378f8e9c9';
UPDATE UserLocationBehavior SET location = 'Home' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserActivity SET activity_type = 'Work' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE UserLocationBehavior SET location='Office', time='2022-10-15 09:00:00' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE UserActivity SET timestamp='2022-10-16 15:30:00', activity_type='Meeting' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_pattern = 'Active User' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE BehaviorLogs SET behavior_description = 'Suspicious behavior detected' WHERE log_id = 201;
UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_pattern = 'New behavior pattern' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE LocationData SET latitude = 37.7749, longitude = -122.4194 WHERE location_id = 201;
